wip: This site is a work in progress. Everything is subject to change.
go-back: Go back to the main page.
content: In this turnbased RPG, you are a lone snowman partaking in a festival about the jobmarket. In the event, you are tasked to help your fellow snowman with their problems ranging from computer viruses to broken down cars and even the dreaded Karen! The more you help others, the more experience you gain and the more effectively you can solve their problems. Do not let the wisdom of your fellow snowmen fall to deaf ears! They hold valuable information that can prove useful in your future job endeavours. Take on the challenges provided by the APUVA staff in order to learn new usable skills! These skills may even hold the key to your success in the future.
subtitle: The APUVA festival is here!
desc: The APUVA festival has arrived! Help your fellow snowman, improve your skills and learn about the job market in this wild turn-based RPG.
